title: Spooky Park
description: Spooky Park is a casual simulation game that puts you in charge of a creepy and mysterious amusement park. In this game, you'll take on the role of the park owner, responsible for designing and managing a theme park that offers spine-tingling experiences to thrill-seeking visitors. If you enjoy simulation games that are a little out of the ordinary, "Spooky Park" offers a captivating journey into the world of thrilling and eerie amusement!
